Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent whether a person is in agreement with the plan of care which has been created for them

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CarePlanAgreement subset with subset original id 5961000000134.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
